entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 05:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
